data.title: Watch Lady in the Lake
data.meta_description: When the disappearance of a young girl grips the city of Baltimore in 1966, the lives of two women converge on a fatal collision course.
data.text:
EPISODE 1

Did you know Seahorses are fish?

Tessie Durst goes missing, sending shockwaves through Baltimore. Cleo and Maddie make life-changing choices. Maddie finds what she feared.

54 min Â· Jul 19, 2024 TV-MA

EPISODE 2

It has to do with the search for the marvelous.

Maddie takes an interest in the Durst case as she starts a new chapter. Cleoâs work for Shell takes a dangerous turn.

53 min Â· Jul 19, 2024 TV-MA

EPISODE 3

I was the first to see her dead. You were the last to see her alive.

Reeling from what happened under her watch,Â Cleo begins forming a plan for her safety. Maddie throws herself into the Durst investigation.

53 min Â· Jul 26, 2024 TV-MA

EPISODE 4

Innocence leaves when you discover cruelty. First in others, then in yourself.

Maddie scores a big interview but struggles to be respected at The Star. Cleo starts implementing her plan as Shell learns troubling information.

51 min Â· Aug 2, 2024 TV-MA

EPISODE 5

Every time someone turns up dead in that lake, it does seem to lead to you.

Cleoâs body is discovered.Â As Maddieâs obsession with Cleo grows deeper, she realizes they once crossed paths.

47 min Â· Aug 9, 2024 TV-MA
